content: materials - 3 skeins of purl soho s lantern 1 61% cotton and 39% linen each skein is 164 yards/ 100 grams approximately 386 yards required we used white smoke - us 8 5 mm 24- or 32- inch circular needles 3 - a spare us 8 circular or double pointed needle 4 - a few yards of sport or light worsted scrap yarn - a stitch marker 5 - a stitch holder 6 optional gauge 27 stitches and 50 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern size - finished circumference 25 inches - finished height 11 inches - base of bag 3½ inches wide x 9 inches long - strap width 3½ inches - strap length 22 inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/lantern 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=971 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964 6 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23859
